name: Kamik Bailee 2 Waterproof Insulated Boots - Women's
description: Warm and waterproof, these boots will keep your toes toasty and dry. A soft fleecy lining ups The Bailee 2’s comfort factor while the fixed foam insulation seals out the cold. Lined with a waterproof breathable membrane to ensure your feet stay dry as you navigate snowdrifts and slushy puddles. With a full side zipper, slipping into and out of these boots is fast and easy, even with gloves on.Soft fleecy lining helps wick way moisture and keeps you cozy and warm.Waterproof breathable DriDefense membrane puts an end to soggy socks.Side zipper makes booting up or booting down easy.Non-marking EVA outsole.Grippy tread helps keep you grounded.
